sys_script_include.name: CarBooking

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_b67910ef1bfd6d50dd39ed3abc4bcb01
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_980836_car.CarBooking</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>CarBooking</name><script><![CDATA[var CarBooking = Class.create();

CarBooking.prototype = {

  initialize: function () {},

  getEndTimeChoices: function(startTimeValue) {
    // Get the end time field object
    var endTimeField = g_form.getControl('endtime');

    // Get the start time value and convert to timestamp
    var startTime = new Date(startTimeValue).getTime();

    // Calculate the end time value as 3 hours after the start time
    var endTime = new Date(startTime + 3 * 60 * 60 * 1000);

    // Create an array of time values for every 15 minutes from start time to end time
    var timeValues = [];
    while (startTime <= endTime) {
      timeValues.push(new Date(startTime).toLocaleTimeString('en-US', {hour12: false, hour: '2-digit', minute:'2-digit'}));
      startTime += 15 * 60 * 1000;
    }

    // Clear existing choices from the end time field
    endTimeField.options.length = 0;

    // Add the new choices to the end time field
    for (var i = 0; i < timeValues.length; i++) {
      var timeValue = timeValues[i];
      endTimeField.options.add(new Option(timeValue, timeValue));
    }
  },

  type: 'CarBooking'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-31 10:48:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>b67910ef1bfd6d50dd39ed3abc4bcb01</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CarBooking</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Car" source="x_980836_car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Car">4ae203981ba52510dd39ed3abc4bcb84</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b67910ef1bfd6d50dd39ed3abc4bcb01</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-03 10:40:11</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
